Cold Crack: 10 Degrees F.

entry.title: Make your own Size Craft Bolt Upholstery Pieces Purchase by the Yard
entry.summary:
Vendor: Toto Fabrics
Type: Upholstery Fabric
Price: 2.50

Craft bolts are a Grab Bag Style of mixed pieces so you get a little of everything. May contain fabrics such as Chenille, Silk, Ultraleather®, Velvet, Tapestry, Crypton®, Automotive, Suede, Sheer, Screen Print, Vinyls, and Faux Leathers. All bolts will have different pieces of fabric remnants. All pieces are at least 1/2 yard long, many will be over 1 yard. Fabric remnants may have staples, tags, tape, and tape residue on them.   Please note that colors appear differently on different monitors.  All craft bolt sales or fabric remnants are final.

Fabric is being sold by the yard. Just enter the amount of yards needed in the quantity box. Price is $2.50 per yard. These are first quality remnants, just end roll pieces.

s:variant.title: Default Title
s:variant.s:sku: 150419-99101 RF Scrap Bolt by the yard
